title: New Year with the Guy Next Door
description: TaylorI didn’t expect to spend my New Year catering for a big party. And I really didn’t expect my next door neighbor to be there with me. Miles is hot as hellfire but we don’t see eye to eye. He’s order and I’m chaos - it’s a recipe for fireworks.When the whole thing goes up in flames, will he save me or watch me burn? MilesI’ve had my eye on her since she moved in next door.But I’m usually serving overseas, until a family tragedy brings me back home. Taylor’s a perfect 10 but she’s making one hell of a mess. She’s way out of line and breaking down all my boundaries. Can I rescue her from disaster and be the hero she needs?Steamy, sweet, upbeat insta-love short romance with an alpha military man and curvy woman. No cheating and a guaranteed HEA for the holidays!
author: Jessa Joy
